title: China's AI ambitions target US tech dominance

title: Goldman Sachs flags risk of disruption in supply of rare earths, key minerals
author: Reuters
description: Goldman Sachs warns of supply chain risks for rare earths, highlighting China's dominance and potential export curbs impacting global industries.

title: BNB Outperforms Wide Market on Growing RWA Adoption, Potential Coinbase Listing
author: CD Analytics, Francisco Rodrigues
